Majesty's order.name: Majesty's order
Majesty's order.effect: +1 attack, +1 defense, +1 special attack, +1 special defense

Adaptibility.name: Adaptibility
Adaptibility.effect: Moves that are the same type as you, +4 damage

Aerilate.name: Aerilate
Aerilate.effect: Your normal moves become flying moves

Aftermath.name: Aftermath
Aftermath.effect: When knocked out by a melee attack, deal 1d20 damage to the attacker

Analytic.name: Analytic
Analytic.effect: When attacking a foe that has already acted this round, +4 damage

Armor tail.name: Armor tail
Armor tail.effect: You are immune to priority attacks that are used out of turn order during combat

Aroma veil.name: Aroma veil
Aroma veil.effect: You and your allies within 10ft are immune to the effects of Heal block, Taunt, Encore, Disable and Cursed body

Battery.name: Battery
Battery.effect: Allies within 15ft of you, +1 special attack

Battle armor.name: Battle armor
Battle armor.effect: Critical hits are treated as normal hits against you

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.effect: While below half HP, +2 special attack

Big pecks.name: Big pecks
Big pecks.effect: Your defense can't be lowered by your foes

Blaze.name: Blaze
Blaze.effect: While you are below 20HP, fire attacks +4 damage

Cheek pouch.name: Cheek pouch
Cheek pouch.effect: When you consume a berry, heal 10HP

Clear body.name: Clear body
Clear body.effect: Your stats can't be lowered by your foes

Cloud nine.name: Cloud nine
Cloud nine.effect: As a free action, use Defog (uses 1 charge)

Color change.name: Color change
Color change.effect: After you take damage, your type becomes the damage type for 5 minutes

Comatose.name: Comatose
Comatose.effect: You are Asleep but can still act (immune to other afflictions)

Commander.name: Commander
Commander.effect: When adjacent to an allied Dondozo, Tatsugiri can go into Dondozo’s mouth as a free action. While inside the allied Dondozo’s mouth, Tatsugiri cannot act and its Skills and Passives cannot be used, but the allied Dondozo has +2 to its Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed. Additionally, Tatsugiri cannot be targeted or hit by any attacks, is unaffected by the effects of any moves, and allows the allied Dondozo to use any of Tatsugiri’s moves

Competitive.name: Competitive
Competitive.effect: If a foe lowers your stats, +2 special attack until returned to normal

Corrosion.name: Corrosion
Corrosion.effect: You can Poison and Toxify Steel-types and Poison-types

Costar.name: Costar
Costar.effect: At the start of combat, copy a stat passive from your nearest ally

Cud chew.name: Cud chew
Cud chew.effect: When you consume a berry, the effect activates again 1 round later

Curious medicine.name: Curious medicine
Curious medicine.effect: Your stats and your adjacent ally's stats cant be lowered by a foe

Cursed body.name: Cursed body
Cursed body.effect: Disable the first melee attack that hits

Cute charm.name: Cute charm
Cute charm.effect: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4 (on 4, Infatuate the attacker)

Damp.name: Damp
Damp.effect: Chloroblast, Explosion, Misty explosion, and Selfdestruct fail to do anything if used within 40ft of you

Dazzling.name: Dazzling
Dazzling.effect: You may not be targeted by priority moves that are used out of turn

Defeatist.name: Defeatist
Defeatist.effect: When your HP is below 50%, -2 all stats

Defiant.name: Defiant
Defiant.effect: If a foe lowers your stats, +2 attack until returned to normal

Disguise.name: Disguise
Disguise.effect: The first attack is negated (each encounter)

Download.name: Download
Download.effect: If the target has lower Defense than Special defense, +1 attack. If the target has lower Special defense than Defense, +1 special attack

Drizzle.name: Drizzle
Drizzle.effect: As a free action, use Rain dance (uses 1 charge)

Drought.name: Drought
Drought.effect: As a free action, use Sunny day (uses 1 charge)

Dry skin.name: Dry skin
Dry skin.effect: In Sunny weather, lose 4HP each round. In Rainy weather, heal 4HP each round. You are immune to Water-type moves

Early bird.name: Early bird
Early bird.effect: Roll with advantage to wake from Sleep

Earth eater.name: Earth eater
Earth eater.effect: When hit by a ground-type move, instead heal half the damage done

Effect spore.name: Effect spore
Effect spore.effect: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4 (on 4, randomly Paralyze/Poison/Sleep the attacker)

Electric surge.name: Electric surge
Electric surge.effect: As a free action, use Electric terrain (uses 1 charge)

Electromorphosis.name: Electromorphosis
Electromorphosis.effect: When hit by an attack that deals damage, you may use Charge as a free action

Emergency exit.name: Emergency exit
Emergency exit.effect: You cannot fight when first damaged below half of Max HP. You will want to run away or return to a Pokéball for 2 rounds. During those two rounds, your speed is doubled

Exposed.name: Exposed
Exposed.effect: When you move or use an attack, you have -8 defense, special defense until your next turn. You also deal -8 damage with all attacks

Filter.name: Filter
Filter.effect: Supereffective moves against you deal 4 less damage (after weakness)

Flame body.name: Flame body
Flame body.effect: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4 (on 4, Burn the attacker)

Flash fire.name: Flash fire
Flash fire.effect: Immune to Fire-type attacks. If you are hit by a Fire-type attack, +4 damage for 2 minutes

Flower gift.name: Flower gift
Flower gift.effect: While in Sunny weather, +6 attack and special attack

Flower veil.name: Flower veil
Flower veil.effect: You and your allied Grass-type's stats cannot be lowered by effects (range 25ft)

Fluffy.name: Fluffy
Fluffy.effect: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, take half damage. But Fire damage is instead doubled

Forecast.name: Forecast
Forecast.effect: Your appearance and type changes with the weather. In Hailing, Hazy, or Misty weather, Castform is Ice-type. In Raining weather, Castform is Water-type. In Sandstorming weather, Castform is Rock-type. In Sunny weather, Castform is Fire-type.

Friend guard.name: Friend guard
Friend guard.effect: Allies within 25ft of you, take -1d4 damage when attacked

Fur coat.name: Fur coat
Fur coat.effect: If hit by a physical move, you take half damage

Gale wings.name: Gale wings
Gale wings.effect: If you use a Flying-type move, +2 speed until the end of your next turn

Galvanize.name: Galvanize
Galvanize.effect: Your Normal-type moves are treated as Electric-type

Good as gold.name: Good as gold
Good as gold.effect: You are immune to Effect moves

Grassy surge.name: Grassy surge
Grassy surge.effect: As a free action, use Grassy terrain (uses 1 charge)

Guard dog.name: Guard dog
Guard dog.effect: If a foe's effect would cause you to move/flee, +1 attack for 10 minutes instead

Gulp missile.name: Gulp missile
Gulp missile.effect: Whenever Cramorant goes underwater, it gathers waste in its mouth. When hit by an attack within 30ft while Cramorant has waste, Cramorant ejects the waste at the offender, dealing 4 damage or 8 damage if Cramorant has less than 20 HP . Waste is held for up to 5 mins

Harvest.name: Harvest
Harvest.effect: When using a Berry, you only use half of it while still gaining its full effects. You can only use half of a Berry if you have Harvest

Healer.name: Healer
Healer.effect: After acting, roll 1d20. On 16 or higher, ny adjecent allies are cured of afflictions

Heatproof.name: Heatproof
Heatproof.effect: Fire-type moves deal 1 damage die less against you.

Hospitality.name: Hospitality
Hospitality.effect: 1/day, the first time you move adjacent to an ally, they are healed 12 HP

Hunger switch.name: Hunger switch
Hunger switch.effect: Whenever Morpeko acts, it changes from Full Belly mode to Hangry mode or back into Full Belly mode from Hangry mode. Aura Wheel is Electric-type in Full Belly mode, Aura Wheel is Dark-type in Hangry mode.

Hustle.name: Hustle
Hustle.effect: Your attacks have -2 accuracy. After the first time you miss an attack during an encounter, the penalty is removed and you have +4 attack

Hydration.name: Hydration
Hydration.effect: While in Rain, you are cured of afflictions

Hyper cutter.name: Hyper cutter
Hyper cutter.effect: Your attack cannot be lowered by a foe's effects

Ice body.name: Ice body
Ice body.effect: You don't take damage from Hail, instead you recover 4 HP after you act

Ice face.name: Ice face
Ice face.effect: The first time Eiscue is hit with a melee attack each encounter; the attack is negated and you change to No Ice Face Form. Ice Face is reset whenever it starts Hailing while you are within its area of effect.

Ice scales.name: Ice scales
Ice scales.effect: If hit by a special move, you take only half damage

Illusion.name: Illusion
Illusion.effect: As a free action, you may change your appearance to look like any Pokémon you have seen in the last hour. The illusion drops when you are hit by an attack and you can't change in Pokémon larger than twice your size

Immunity.name: Immunity
Immunity.effect: You are immune to the afflictions Poisoned and Toxified

Imposter.name: Imposter
Imposter.effect: As a free action, you may use Transform

Infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
Infiltrator.effect: Hindering terrain and walls do not affect you or your attacks

Innards out.name: Innards out
Innards out.effect: When you are knocked out by a melee attack, deal damage to the attacker equal to the damage you just took

Inner focus.name: Inner focus
Inner focus.effect: You are immune to being Stunned

Iron barbs.name: Iron barbs
Iron barbs.effect: When you are hit by a melee attack, the attacker takes 4 damage.

Justified.name: Justified
Justified.effect: When a foe hits you with a Dark-ype move, +1 attack for 10 minutes

Keen eye.name: Keen eye
Keen eye.effect: Your accuracy checks are not negatively affected by foes

Leaf guard.name: Leaf guard
Leaf guard.effect: While in Sunny weather, your afflictions are cured

Levitate.name: Levitate
Levitate.effect: You are immune to Ground-type attacks (while airborne)

Libero.name: Libero
Libero.effect: You may change your type into the same type of the attack you are making

Lightning rod.name: Lightning rod
Lightning rod.effect: Any foe’s ranged Electric-type attacks within 25ft or any adjacent foe’s Electric-type attacks are negated and drawn to you. Your Special Attack is +2 until the end of your next turn whenever you negate an Electric-type attack

Limber.name: Limber
Limber.effect: You are immune to being Paralyzed

Lingering aroma.name: Lingering aroma
Lingering aroma.effect: When you are hit by a foe’s melee attack, disable all of the foe’s ability passives, then they gain Lingering Aroma for 10 mins

Liquid ooze.name: Liquid ooze
Liquid ooze.effect: If you are hit by an attack that damages you and heals the attacker, the attacker is dealt damage equal to what they would have healed, instead of healing

Liquid voice.name: Liquid voice
Liquid voice.effect: Sound-based moves made by you are Water-type

Magic bounce.name: Magic bounce
Magic bounce.effect: If you are hit by an attack that does not deal damage, the attacker is instead affected by the effects of their own attack

Magic guard.name: Magic guard
Magic guard.effect: Foes can only deal damage to you with attacks that deal damage. You are unaffected by damage from afflictions, coats, hazards, weather or any passives given by foes

Magician.name: Magician
Magician.effect: When hitting with a melee attack, you steal the target’s held item

Magma armor.name: Magma armor
Magma armor.effect: You are immune to being Frozen

Merciless.name: Merciless
Merciless.effect: If the target of your attack is Poisoned or Toxified, your hits are critical hits

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.effect: After acting, your type changes to reflect your current surroundings

Minus.name: Minus
Minus.effect: If at least one ally has Plus or Minus within 10ft of you, +3 Special Attack

Mirror armor.name: Mirror armor
Mirror armor.effect: If your stats would be lowered by a foe’s effects, instead that offender’s stat is lowered

Misty surge.name: Misty surge
Misty surge.effect: As a free action, use Misty terrain (uses 1 charge)

Mold breaker.name: Mold breaker
Mold breaker.effect: Your attacks ignore any passives that would redirect, negate or weaken your attacks

Motor drive.name: Motor drive
Motor drive.effect: Any Electric-type attack that hits you is negated and your speed is +1 for 10 minutes (This can stack)

Multiscale.name: Multiscale
Multiscale.effect: When you are at Max HP, you take –4 damage from all attacks

Mummy.name: Mummy
Mummy.effect: When you are hit by a foe’s melee attack, disable all of the foe’s ability passives, then they gain Mummy for 10 minutes

Mycelium might.name: Mycelium might
Mycelium might.effect: When using an attack that can cause afflictions, ignore any immunities that foes may have when applying the affliction

Natural cure.name: Natural cure
Natural cure.effect: Whenever returned to a Poke Ball, you are cured of any afflictions

Neutralizing gas.name: Neutralizing gas
Neutralizing gas.effect: Ability passives other than your own do not work within 10ft of you

No guard.name: No guard
No guard.effect: You cannot miss your attacks, and attacks made against you cannot miss

Normalize.name: Normalize
Normalize.effect: Attacks performed by you are treated as Normal-type attacks

Overcoat.name: Overcoat
Overcoat.effect: You are immune to damage from weather

Overgrow.name: Overgrow
Overgrow.effect: When you are below 20 HP, your Grass-type attacks deal +4 damage

Own tempo.name: Own tempo
Own tempo.effect: You are immune to being Confused

Pastel veil.name: Pastel veil
Pastel veil.effect: You and your allies within 10ft of you are immune to being Poisoned or Toxified

Perish body.name: Perish body
Perish body.effect: When you are hit by a melee attack, the offender receives 3 Perish Coats. The Coat has the following ability: After acting, destroy one of your Perish Coats. If this is the third Perish Coat you’ve destroyed this way during this encounter, set your HP to 0

Pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
Pickpocket.effect: When you are hit by a melee attack, you steal the offender’s held item

Pixilate.name: Pixilate
Pixilate.effect: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Fairy-type moves

Plus.name: Plus
Plus.effect: If at least one ally has Plus or Minus within 10ft of you, you have +3 Special Attack

Poison heal.name: Poison heal
Poison heal.effect: While afflicted with Poison or Toxification, you are healed instead of damaged by those afflictions. You are cured of Poison or Toxin once you are at Max HP

Poison point.name: Poison point
Poison point.effect: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On 4, Poison the attacker

Poison touch.name: Poison touch
Poison touch.effect: Whenever you hit with a melee attack, you may roll 1d6. On 6, Poison the target

Power of alchemy.name: Power of alchemy
Power of alchemy.effect: When an ally is knocked out within 10ft of you, you gain one of your ally’s passives for 2 minutes

Power spot.name: Power spot
Power spot.effect: Attacks made within 10ft of you deal +4 damage, regardless if the attacker is friend or foe

Prankster.name: Prankster
Prankster.effect: Your attacks that do not deal damage on hit have Priority

Pressure.name: Pressure
Pressure.effect: If you are hit by a 3/day attack, the attacker can’t use that attack for the remainder of the day

Propeller tail.name: Propeller tail
Propeller tail.effect: Your attacks cannot be redirected by passives or any other effect (except by interception), instead only hitting a target your attack was directed at

Protean.name: Protean
Protean.effect: You may change your type to the same type as an attack you are making while making it for 10 minutes

Psychic surge.name: Psychic surge
Psychic surge.effect: As a free action you may deplete one use of Psychic Terrain and use Psychic Terrain

Punk rock.name: Punk rock
Punk rock.effect: Your sound-based attacks deal +4 damage. You take 4 less damage from sound-based attacks

Purifying salt.name: Purifying salt
Purifying salt.effect: You are immune to status afflictions. You are resistant to Ghost-type attacks

Queenly majesty.name: Queenly majesty
Queenly majesty.effect: You may not be targeted by Priority moves that are being used out of turn order

Quick draw.name: Quick draw
Quick draw.effect: 1/day, you may give one of your moves priority

Rain dish.name: Rain dish
Rain dish.effect: If in Raining Weather, you regain 4 HP after you act

Rattled.name: Rattled
Rattled.effect: When a foe hits you with a Bug-type, Ghost-type, or Dark-type attack, your Speed is +1 for 10 minutes (This can stack)

Receiver.name: Receiver
Receiver.effect: When an ally is knocked out within 10ft of you, you gain one of your ally’s passives for 2 mins

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.effect: Your attacks that damage yourself on hit, deal +4 damage

Refrigerate.name: Refrigerate
Refrigerate.effect: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Ice-type moves

Regenerator.name: Regenerator
Regenerator.effect: When returned to a Poke Ball, you recover to Max HP after being stored for 1 hour

Ripen.name: Ripen
Ripen.effect: When you use a Berry, double any effects it has

Rock head.name: Rock head
Rock head.effect: Your attacks that damage yourself on hit do not damage yourself

Rough skin.name: Rough skin
Rough skin.effect: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, the attacker takes 4 damage

Sand force.name: Sand force
Sand force.effect: While in Sandstorming Weather, your Rock-type and Ground-type attacks deal +4 damage and you don’t take damage from Sandstorming weather

Sand rush.name: Sand rush
Sand rush.effect: While in Sandstorming Weather, your Speed is +2 and you don’t take damage from Sandstorming weather

Sand spit.name: Sand spit
Sand spit.effect: When you are hit by a melee attack, as a free action you may deplete one use of Sandstorm and use Sandstorm immediately

Sand stream.name: Sand stream
Sand stream.effect:
As a free action you may deplete one use of
Sandstorm and use Sandstorm

Sand veil.name: Sand veil
Sand veil.effect: While in Sandstorming Weather, any foe’s attacks made against you have -1 during accuracy check and you don’t take damage from Sandstorming weather

Sap sipper.name: Sap sipper
Sap sipper.effect: You are immune to Grass-type attacks. If you would be hit by a Grass-type attack, your Attack is +2 for 10 minutes

Schooling.name: Schooling
Schooling.effect: When Wishiwashi is at half its HP or higher, it is in its School form. In its School form, Wishiwashi summons hundreds of fish-shaped balls of water and surrounds itself making it appear larger and making it stronger. When Wishiwashi is below half of its max hit points, Wishiwashi is in its Single form, dropping its façade and appearing much smaller on its own

Scrappy.name: Scrappy
Scrappy.effect: Your Normal-type and Fighting-type attacks can hit Ghost-type targets

Screen cleaner.name: Screen cleaner
Screen cleaner.effect: Whenever you move through a Wall, Hazard, or adjacent to someone with a Coat, destroy all Walls, Hazards and Coats

Seed sower.name: Seed sower
Seed sower.effect: When you are hit by an attack that dealt damage, as a free action you may deplete one use of Grassy Terrain and use Grassy Terrain immediately

Shed skin.name: Shed skin
Shed skin.effect: After acting, you may roll 1d4. On 4, you are cured of any afflictions

Sheer force.name: Sheer force
Sheer force.effect: Your attacks that have additional effects that affect the target may deal +4 damage, but will not have those additional effects

Shell armor.name: Shell armor
Shell armor.effect: Critical hits are treated as normal hits against you

Shields down.name: Shields down
Shields down.effect: When Minior’s HP is at or below half of its max HP, its form changes to Core Revealed. While Minior is not in its Core Revealed form, it is immune to afflictions

Shield dust.name: Shield dust
Shield dust.effect: You are unaffected by additional effects from attacks that deal damage

Skill link.name: Skill link
Skill link.effect: Your scatter moves have +2 during Accuracy Check

Slush rush.name: Slush rush
Slush rush.effect: While in Hailing weather, your Speed is +2 and you don’t take damage from Hailing weather

Sniper.name: Sniper
Sniper.effect: When you land a critical hit, you deal an additional 8 damage

Snow cloak.name: Snow cloak
Snow cloak.effect: While in Hailing weather, any foe’s attacks made against you have -1 during Accuracy Check and you don’t take damage from Hailing weather

Snow warning.name: Snow warning
Snow warning.effect: As a free action you may deplete one use of Hail and use Hail

Solar power.name: Solar power
Solar power.effect: While in Sunny weather, you deal an additional 4 damage while attacking. After acting in Sunny weather, you take 4 damage

Solid rock.name: Solid rock
Solid rock.effect: Super-effective attacks against you deal –4 damage

Soundproof.name: Soundproof
Soundproof.effect: You are immune to sound-based attacks

Stakeout.name: Stakeout
Stakeout.effect: When you attack a target who has just joined the encounter since your last turn, you deal +4 damage

Stalwart.name: Stalwart
Stalwart.effect: Your attacks cannot be redirected by passives or any other effect (except by interception), instead only hitting a target your attack was directed at

Stance change.name: Stance change
Stance change.effect: Aegislash has two forms it constantly changes between. When you attack a foe, before making your accuracy check change into your Sword Form. When using a reaction move such as King’s Shield or Protect, or a protective move like Safeguard or Light Screen, immediately change to Shield Form

Static.name: Static
Static.effect: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On 4, Paralyze the attacker

Steadfast.name: Steadfast
Steadfast.effect: When you are Stunned, your Speed is +1 for 10 minutes

Steam engine.name: Steam engine
Steam engine.effect: When a foe hits you with a Fire-type or Water-type attack, your Speed is +2 for 10 minutes

Steely spirit.name: Steely spirit
Steely spirit.effect: Steel-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage

Stench.name: Stench
Stench.effect: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On 4, Stun the attacker

Sticky hold.name: Sticky hold
Sticky hold.effect: You cannot drop held items or have held items stolen from you

Storm drain.name: Storm drain
Storm drain.effect: Any foe’s ranged Water-type attacks within 25ft or any adjacent foe’s Water-type attacks are negated and drawn to you. Your Special Attack is +2 until the end of your next turn whenever you negate a Water-type attack

Sturdy.name: Sturdy
Sturdy.effect: If you are brought from max HP to 0, you are instead brought to 1HP.

Suction cups.name: Suction cups
Suction cups.effect: You cannot be moved by a foe’s attacks

Supreme overlord.name: Supreme overlord
Supreme overlord.effect: When you join combat, your Attack and Special Attack are each raised +1 for each ally who has already been knocked out in the current encounter, for 10 minutes. Supreme Overlord can only raise your Attack and Special Attack each up to +4

Surge surfer.name: Surge surfer
Surge surfer.effect: While in Electrified terrain, your Speed is +2

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.effect: When you are below 20 HP, your Bug-type attacks deal +4 damage

Sweet veil.name: Sweet veil
Sweet veil.effect: You and your allies within 10ft of you are immune to being put to Sleep

Swift swim.name: Swift swim
Swift swim.effect: While in Raining weather or in water, your Speed is +2

Symbiosis.name: Symbiosis
Symbiosis.effect: You can pass held items to allies within 10ft as a free action

Synchronize.name: Synchronize
Synchronize.effect: When you are Burned, Confused, Frozen, Poisoned, Paralyzed, put to Sleep, or Toxified by a foe, the offender is also given the same affliction

Tangled feet.name: Tangled feet
Tangled feet.effect: While you are confused, any foe’s attacks made against you have -1 during accuracy check

Technician.name: Technician
Technician.effect: When rolling damage, replace any rolls below three with a three.

Telepathy.name: Telepathy
Telepathy.effect: Your allies within 25ft do not harm you when the ally is using attacks that have an area of effect

Thermal exchange.name: Thermal exchange
Thermal exchange.effect: You are immune to being Burned. When you are hit by a Fire-type attack, your Attack is +2 for 10 minutes

Thick fat.name: Thick fat
Thick fat.effect: You take -4 damage from Fire-type attacks and Ice-type attacks

Too pure.name: Too pure
Too pure.effect: All attacks made against you are treated as if they are super-effective. If the attack already is, the attacker rolls +1 dice while rolling for damage

Torrent.name: Torrent
Torrent.effect: When you are below 20 HP, your Water-type attacks deal +4 damage

Toxic boost.name: Toxic boost
Toxic boost.effect: If you would have been Poisoned, or Toxified, you are not and your Attack is +2 for 2 minutes

Toxic debris.name: Toxic debris
Toxic debris.effect: When you are hit by an attack that dealt damage, as a free action you may deplete one use of Toxic Spikes and use Toxic Spikes immediately

Triage.name: Triage
Triage.effect: Any moves you know that can heal have Reaction

Truant.name: Truant
Truant.effect: All your moves have recharge turns. Truant cannot be removed, ignored, or disabled by any means

Unnerve.name: Unnerve
Unnerve.effect: Foes within 25ft of you cannot consume food

Vital spirit.name: Vital spirit
Vital spirit.effect: You are immune to being put to Sleep

Volt absorb.name: Volt absorb
Volt absorb.effect: When you are hit by an electric-type attack, halve the damage, then you heal that much HP instead of taking damage

Wandering spirit.name: Wandering spirit
Wandering spirit.effect: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, you gain all of the offender’s ability passives and lose Wandering Spirit, then they gain Wandering Spirit and lose all of their ability Passives for 10 minutes

Water absorb.name: Water absorb
Water absorb.effect: When you are hit by a water-type attack, halve the damage, then you heal that much HP instead of taking damage

Water bubble.name: Water bubble
Water bubble.effect: You take -4 damage from Fire-type attacks. You add +4 damage to Water-type attacks. You are immune to being Burned

Water compaction.name: Water compaction
Water compaction.effect: When a foe hits you with a Water-type attack, your Defense is +2 for 10 minutes

Water veil.name: Water veil
Water veil.effect: You are immune to being Burned

Weak armor.name: Weak armor
Weak armor.effect: When you are hit by a melee attack, your Defense is -3 and your Speed is +3 for 10 minutes

Well-baked body.name: Well-baked body
Well-baked body.effect: You are immune to Fire-type attacks. When you are hit by Fire-type attacks, instead your Defense is +2 for 10 minutes

White smoke.name: White smoke
White smoke.effect: Your stats cannot be lowered by a foe’s effects

Wind power.name: Wind power
Wind power.effect: When hit by a wind based attack, you may use the move Charge as a free action

Wind rider.name: Wind rider
Wind rider.effect: When hit by a wind based attack, your Attack is +1 for 10 minutes

Wonder guard.name: Wonder guard
Wonder guard.effect: Shedinja is immune to attacks that are not supereffective. Wonder Guard cannot be removed, ignored, or disabled by any means

Wonder skin.name: Wonder skin
Wonder skin.effect: Your stats cannot be lowered by a foe’s effects

Zen mode.name: Zen mode
Zen mode.effect: Darmanitan changes to its Zen Mode when it is at or below half of its max HP

Zero to hero.name: Zero to hero
Zero to hero.effect: When Palafin is reduced to 30 or less HP or if an ally is knocked out within 30ft of Palafin, you change from your Zero form to your Hero form for 10 minutes

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.effect: Can change their body into a liquid-like state

Climber.name: Climber
Climber.effect: Treats walls and ceiling as normal terrain

Flopper.name: Flopper
Flopper.effect: Treats dry land as special terrain

Repulsive.name: Repulsive
Repulsive.effect: Repels others with a foul smell

Telekinetic.name: Telekinetic
Telekinetic.effect: Can move things with their mind

Threaded.name: Threaded
Threaded.effect: Can move around on threads or vines

Salt-water dweller.name: Salt-water dweller
Salt-water dweller.effect: Can only survive in salt water

Fresh-water dweller.name: Fresh-water dweller
Fresh-water dweller.effect: Can only survive in fresh water
